CustomField.description: If TRUE, this field meets the requirement to calculate the metadata references.
CustomField.formula: AND ( fpro__Is_Custom_Field__c, fpro__Is_Deleted__c = false, OR ( ISNULL(fpro__Last_Refresh_Date_MCD__c), DATEVALUE(fpro__Last_Refresh_Date_MCD__c) < TODAY() ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If TRUE, this field meets the requirement to calculate the metadata references.
CustomField.label: Run Service (MCD)?
